meanings.definition: The quality or state of being chubby.
meanings.sent1: Her chubbiness made her look cute and cuddly.
meanings.sent2: The baby's chubbiness was adored by everyone.
meanings.sent3: Despite her chubbiness, she was a fast runner.
meanings.sent4: The chubbiness of the teddy bear made it extra huggable.
meanings.sent5: The chubbiness of the cheeks added to her youthful appearance.

meanings.definition: The condition of having excess body fat.
meanings.sent1: His chubbiness was a result of overeating sweets.
meanings.sent2: The doctor advised him to exercise to reduce his chubbiness.
meanings.sent3: The cat's chubbiness made it a perfect candidate for a pet food commercial.
meanings.sent4: The chubbiness around his waistline was a reminder of his love for pizza.
meanings.sent5: The chubbiness in her face softened her features and gave her a friendly look.
